name: Puzzle Ball Shoot
description:
Hope you’re ready for a fun adventure and a crazy bubble popping party! Download for free and enjoy thousands of colorful levels filled with cool boosters and power-ups. Work your way through some bubble challenges and puzzles and help the troll to clear the board!

Features:
- Over 850 bubble shooting levels with uniquely challenging obstacles
- Match and shoot bubbles to save cute baby kittens
- Collect enough kittens to level up
- Power-ups and special bubbles to help you pass tricky levels
- Easy and fun for whole family and all ages to play
- Exquisite game interface and cool animation effects
- Completely free to play
